description:
cmd/{6,8}l: always pass framesize to morestack
This is required for preemptive scheduler.
With this change it's possible to not create
a new stack segment on every preemption
if the current stack segement has enough space.
W/o framesize it's impossible to determine
what is enough space.
The change increases size of net/http.test
by 0.28% on 386, and 0.15% on amd64.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/
I believe my pending runtime CL makes this one unnecessary.

subject: code review 10239044: cmd/{6,8}l: always pass framesize to morestack
